Mongrel Mob member Stephen Parkinson loses appeal; sentence for tomahawk attack could have been longer https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mongrel-mob-member-stephen-parkinson-loses-appeal-sentence-for-tomahawk-attack-could-have-been-longer/C3HZRHIBI5DTFMS62J4BCKN7KA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mongrel-mob-member-stephen-parkinson-loses-appeal-sentence-for-tomahawk-attack-could-have-been-longer/C3HZRHIBI5DTFMS62J4BCKN7KA/ Ric StevensThe gang member has now failed in an appeal against his jail sentence. Wed, 16 Oct 2024 07:00:00 +0000 Stephen Parkinson was accompanied by about five Mongrel Mob associates when he attacked a man with a tomahawk in Gisborne. File photo / NZME
Lotto: Powerball remains unstruck, jackpots to $26 million; Strike player bags $800,000 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-massive-23-million-up-for-grabs-in-wednesday-night-draw/6GD443P5RRC6VGE4TPGPAXCEAU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-massive-23-million-up-for-grabs-in-wednesday-night-draw/6GD443P5RRC6VGE4TPGPAXCEAU/ A total of 16 punters have struck it big in 2024 and been crowned multimillionaires. Wed, 16 Oct 2024 06:56:53 +0000 A mouth-watering $23 million is up for grabs tonight after Lotto’s Powerball jackpot went unstruck at the weekend.
MediaWorks confirms plan to disestablish some roles in attempt to ‘evolve’ to market https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mediaworks-confirms-multiple-roles-will-be-disbuilted-dozens-of-staff-impacted/SLBKJUDWIZCN5IKO5JSHW3SSWQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mediaworks-confirms-multiple-roles-will-be-disbuilted-dozens-of-staff-impacted/SLBKJUDWIZCN5IKO5JSHW3SSWQ/ Katie HarrisSome staff have been given just 72 hours to provide feedback. Wed, 16 Oct 2024 06:25:38 +0000 Earlier this year MediaWorks posted a net after-tax loss of $107.1 million after an impairment of $86.5 million – it insisted its “turnaround” is on track, despite a challenging economy and media market.
